mapper.select: select a.PayID , a.SheetID , a.ProjectID , a.SupplierID , a.zong , a.xiaoji , a.yiqian , a.bennian , a.benci , a.AuditTime , t1.ProjectName as ProjectIDLinkText , t2.SupplierName as SupplierIDLinkText , t3.DictionaryName as Character ,b.sheettype from Aud_BudgetPay a join Aud_Project t1 on t1.ProjectID = a.ProjectID join SRM_SupplierInfo t2 on t2.SupplierID = a.SupplierID left join (select sup.SupplierID as SupplierID, dc.DictionaryName as DictionaryName from BAS_Dictionary dc join SRM_SupplierInfo sup on dc.DictionaryID = sup.Character ) t3 on a.SupplierID = t3.SupplierID left join Aud_Sheet b on b.SheetID = a.SheetID where a.SheetID = #{sheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into Aud_BudgetPay (PayID, SheetID, ProjectID, SupplierID, zong, xiaoji, yiqian, bennian, benci, AuditTime) values (#{payid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xiaoji,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yiqian,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bennian,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{benci,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{audittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Aud_BudgetPay set SheetID = #{sheetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zong = #{zong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, xiaoji = #{xiaoji,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yiqian = #{yiqian,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bennian = #{bennian,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, benci = #{benci,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AuditTime = #{audittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PayID = #{payid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PayID, SheetID, ProjectID, SupplierID, zong, xiaoji, yiqian, bennian, benci, AuditTime from Aud_BudgetPay where PayID = #{payid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select PayID, SheetID, ProjectID, SupplierID, zong, xiaoji, yiqian, bennian, benci, AuditTime from Aud_BudgetPay
